title: Pbe question
body: If u had the pbe error for signups then does that mean u r able to play on pbe servers. I rllly hope that it means that i can signup

replies.body: There was an [announcement](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/EGhTBUV6-pbe-signups-are-closed) last night regarding the PBE site going down until further notice.  If you already have an account, you should be able to download the client and get in without issue.  I hope that helps!
my question for RG how to waiting email from RG send in my email done step 3 & 4.im done step 1 2 undone step 3 & 4

ty 
i have pbe client for some reason but no account i read the announcement tyty
